item.title: AWS Billing Transfer
item.description: AWS Billing Transfer is a new feature (GA since November 2025) that streamlines billing management across multiple AWS Organizations. It helps companies and channel partners who manage multiple Organizations by enabling centralized billing while keeping security and autonomy decentralized for business units or end customers.
